articles.author: Alexander Hall
articles.title: CNN anchor asks if US wants ‘4 more years’ of Biden when 74% of Americans say US headed in ‘wrong direction' - Fox News
articles.description: A CNN host expressed skepticism that Biden can viably run for reelection when so many American citizen are skeptical of America's future on its current course.
articles.content:
CNN anchor John King noted President Bidens key challenges, and asked whether the American public truly plans to reelect him in 2024.
While the political pushback many expected for Democrats in the … [+1897 chars]
